version_description: - Fixed an issue where the media player would crash in certain instances

• Updated for iPhone X

We appreciate your feedback. Please email us at appsupport@brady-software.com with any suggestions or questions. If you like these changes, please let us know by rating and reviewing us in the App Store!

Bug Fix
• Fixed an issue when selecting a new station, the player wouldn't reset
